duties_responsibilities.duty: Gain hands-on experience in commercial construction projects under the guidance of experienced professionals.
Assist in the management of construction projects and ensure adherence to quality and safety standards.
Communicate effectively with project stakeholders and team members to facilitate project progress.
Assist in the use of PROCORE and/or Bluebeam for project management and documentation.

education_certification.credential: Currently enrolled in a college/university in a bachelor's degree program in Construction Management.
